title: Huawei Watch_How does the Huawei Watch measure my heart rate?
answer:
The Huawei Watch comes with a cutting-edge heart rate monitor that calculates your heart rate by monitoring the pulses on your wrist.
![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/73445_ctaak.gif) NOTE: 

The heart rate monitor should not be used for medical purposes and may have inaccurate results for skin colors with artificial pigment.
